attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: Anytime I opened the app it would crash and my phone would freeze. I would then have to fully power off my phone to try and use it again and it never worked.

attributes.title: Awful app.
attributes.review: This app has made my phone crash multiple times upon opening it. The format is confusing and hard to understand. It should be deleted entirely. Not worth fixing it.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The software this app has must be old. The app keeps crashing, takes up all my storage, and drains my battery from the location tracking. Terrible app i wish i could rate it 0 stars.

attributes.title: killed meâœ¨
attributes.review: i was so excited to download this and keep up to date on our wonderful president, but shortly after i downloaded it my phone blew up in my hands and i died immediately. writing this as a ghost, i am very disappointed with this app and will be expecting financial compensation for my death. i must say, i anticipated better from such a good person, but sadly i'm obligated to put in a bad word to the other dead people up here. will not be downloading again.
